tests.name: Flight Duration
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Flight_Duration ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o flightDuration testSuite/mono/fileName &>> __autograding/Flight_Duration/expected ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o flightDuration testSuite/mono/fileName &>>  __autograding/Flight_Duration/output

tests.name: Flight Distance
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Flight_Distance ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o flightDistance testSuite/mono/fileName &>> __autograding/Flight_Distance/expected ; ls testSuite/mono | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o flightDistance testSuite/mono/fileName &>>  __autograding/Flight_Distance/output
